question: This video is from the Mayo Clinic w/respect to self injections. (meant for insulin but same as our instructions w/HCG) Shows how to insert needle, air, etc. Very informative.www.mayoclinic.com/health/diabetes-treatment/MM00403Another good pdf file for instructions is:www.villagepharmacy.com/stuff/contentmgr/files/4d1875074c8b5fa1851730e53805051e/pdf/18_19_20.pdf
title: Great video on injecting
